entry.title: The Tale of Baby Issac
entry.summary:
Author: Becky_Boo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,952Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 22

Summary: When Derek and Stiles leave the McCall Pack to create their own Pack, Isaac feels adrift, but he stays because of his loyalty to Scott. However, as time goes by, Isaac feels more alone in Scott's Pack.  Isaac's decision to leave leads him to the Hale Pack's front door.  Will Stiles and Derek accept Isaac into their Pack? How will the rest of the Hales react to Isaac?

entry.title: bad idea right?
entry.summary:
Author: milf_lovers_anon_42

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,041Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 35

Summary: It’s Stiles’s Freshman year of college and his life in Beacon Hills is finally quiet, no rogue packs, no crazy werewolf hunters, and no one trying to kill him. He couldn’t be more miserable.But this is Stiles Stilinski we are talking about, the quiet never lasts. A kidnapping followed by a series of unexplained disturbances around Beacon Hills pushes him back into the life of supernatural mysteries. It just so happens that he may need the help of a certain annoying, grouchy, hot, werewolf to get to the bottom of what’s causing the sudden chaos.

entry.title: The Hunted Heart Never Rests
entry.summary:
Author: SummertimeRadness

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,443Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Stiles comes from a hunter family, and for the last decade, he's spent his summers training to become the perfect killer. All that's left is to get high school over with and be officially initiated into the clan. Of course, he doesn't count on almost dying in the woods, or on being rescued by one of the werewolves his family is sworn to kill.Derek has been on the run with his sisters since hunters burned down his home and everyone in it. When a string of murders draws them back to Beacon Hills, Derek goes looking for a killer in the woods, only to find a helpless, unconscious human instead...

entry.title: Ashes & Embers
entry.summary:
Author: Mustbejegulusormostotherthings

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,634Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Stiles Stilinski always knew there was something different about him—sparks danced at his fingertips when his emotions ran high, and strange things happened when he wasn’t paying attention. Years after the fall of the Nogitsune and the pack finally finding some peace, he begins to unravel the truth about his magical heritage: he’s not just a spark. He’s a conduit.With Beacon Hills growing restless under a rising supernatural threat, and Derek Hale—his wolf, his anchor, his boyfriend—by his side, Stiles is forced to confront the origin of his power. But the deeper he digs, the more dangerous it becomes. Because some embers were never meant to be reignited.And not everything that burns is meant to survive.

entry.title: Blood Magick
entry.summary:
Author: misfitmonarchy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,578Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 51

Summary: “Freeze! You--” Derek lunges and catches the wildling’s ankle. He grins, all teeth, and yanks the scrambling man so that the wildling’s body falls flat. It’s not too uncommon to find wildlings outside of cities, but they tended to wander the trade routes or at least areas with better shelter.The wildling’s arms are strong enough to fight back, and if he weren’t inhibited by his wolf’s strength, Derek presumes it would be quite a fight. As it were, he pinned the thief easily, chest down and flailing like a huffing like an animal.“Have nothing to say, thief?”--Derek and his pack of werewolves are fur traders working their way through the winter trading route when one evening, a thief is discovered after stealing their wares. Caught red handed, they take the thief prisoner and discover that the thief is much more than he seems

entry.title: symphonic devotion
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,226Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: “When fate is messed with, it punishes those who messes with the flow of time and rewards those who were affected.”  After taking his own life in a bathtub, Derek Hale wakes up as a ghost trapped in a strange, distorted version of his neighborhood—alongside another ghost named ‘Stiles’. Neither remembers anything about their past, but they're inexplicably tied to one another. All they have to guide them are an old piano and two eerily familiar houses.Or; two memory-less spirits search for answers about who they were, why they're connected, and what this so-called “happy ending” is all about—only to discover comfort and companionship in each other along the way. - as seen on wattpad -
